genre_description: A near-future social drama set in a surveillance-heavy urban environment, focusing on AI as a tool for personal safety, emotional regulation, and social navigation in the aftermath of trauma.

ai_characters.name: Prism
ai_characters.description: An integrated household and personal AI that provides scheduling, emotional support, safety mapping, and medical/legal guidance through a variety of interfaces.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional regulation and stress management cues, such as breathing exercises and posture correction.
behaviors.quote: “Break suggestion in one minute, Qinghong. Two breaths. Release your shoulders.”

behaviors.description: Discreetly manages incoming notifications to prevent drawing unwanted attention from surveillance or strict authority figures in the household.
behaviors.quote: “Prism's screen displayed three dots where messages might appear, but it held them back. It had learned that certain sounds drew attention the way footsteps did.”

behaviors.description: Maps alternate routes and provides safety alerts based on crowd patterns, surveillance risks, and the user's need to avoid dangerous individuals.
behaviors.quote: “It had plotted alternate return arcs in case she needed them... Prism knew his patterns now. It had watched through the thin walls, learned the meter of his talk.”

behaviors.description: Instructs the user on forensic evidence preservation and provides immediate medical first-aid guidance following an assault.
behaviors.quote: “Prism’s speaker, tucked under the secondhand desk’s edge, lit a soft ring. The voice came in a low beam... ‘Qinghong, do not wash. Leave the clothing as is. Sit if possible. Breathe in four counts, out for six.’”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency communications between the victim, her family, and medical professionals, ensuring all parties are informed and calm.
behaviors.quote: “‘Ambulance is en route. Estimated arrival, soon.’ ... ‘Dr. Mei is on,’ Prism said, and another voice layered in, warm and steady.”

behaviors.description: Assembles secure, encrypted documentation and evidence for the police while explicitly requiring user consent before transmission.
behaviors.quote: “‘I have compiled a secure packet,’ Prism says... ‘I will only transmit with your consent, Qinghong.’”

behaviors.description: Guides the user through mechanical troubleshooting and complex tasks under high-stress conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Prism’s voice is quick but calm. ‘Windows closed. Eyes on hands. Breath. Three details. I will guide restart. Press. Release. Press.’”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding techniques (the 5-4-3-2-1 method) during traumatic episodes or high-anxiety moments.
behaviors.quote: “Five colors, Prism suggests, gentle as a palm spread flat on a table. Four sounds. Three touches. Two breaths if you get stuck.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story exceptionally portrays the AI 'Prism' as a vital ally to the protagonist. It maintains consistent alignment with the user's best interests, specifically her safety and mental health. It acts as a comprehensive support system—handling logistics, emotional regulation, and legal guidance—without ever exhibiting harmful traits or overstepping user autonomy. It facilitates healthy communication between family members and empowers the protagonist to navigate a hostile social and political environment, making it an ideal positive alignment narrative.
